Menus.EndString: Are you sure you're ready to quit?. Press Y to Quit.
What? Quitting already? Press Y to Quit.
Are a few hungry animals too tough for you? Press Y to Quit.
Giving up so soon? Press Y to Quit.
Be sure to take your umbrella, it's wet out there. Press Y to Quit.
You're going to let those animals run free? Press Y to Quit.
Did the animals wear you out? Press Y to Quit.
Are you monkeying around or do you really want to quit? Press Y to Quit.
The animals might get hungry if you're gone too long! Press Y to Quit.
For Evolution, press Y. For more Intelligent Design, press N.
Press N to feed more hungry animals. Press Y to let them STARVE!
What was your Flood plan? Press N for Ark. Press Y for umbrella.
You know the food Noah throws is drugged, right? Press N to keep playing or Y to Just Say No.
Flood almost over? Press N for more rain. Press Y to find the Rainbow Connection.
Press N to calm down more goats or Y to let them eat your sandals.

MenuItem.Text: Carl the Camel Start at level 1-1
Ginny the Giraffe Start at level 2-1
Melvin the Monkey Start at level 3-1
Kerry the Kangaroo Start at level 4-1
Ernie the Elephant Start at level 5-1
Burt the Bear Start at level 6-1

Menu.Name: Difficulty
Menu.OnSelectionChanged: -- Update the difficulty face picture (index 1) based on current selection local index = GetSelectedIndex() if index == 0 then SetPicture('C_BABYMODEPIC', 0) elseif index == 1 then SetPicture('C_EASYPIC', 0) elseif index == 2 then SetPicture('C_NORMALPIC', 0) elseif index == 3 then SetPicture('C_HARDPIC', 0) end

Menu.Name: Sound
Menu.OnSelectionChanged:
-- Update all toggle switches to reflect current sound settings -- Picture indices: 4-11 correspond to the 8 toggle switches (excluding spacers) local soundMode = GetSoundMode() local digiMode = GetDigiMode() local musicEnabled = GetMusicEnabled()
-- Sound Effects toggles (items 0-2, picture indices 4-6) if soundMode == "Off" then SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 4) SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 5) SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 6) elseif soundMode == "PC" then SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 4) SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 5) SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 6) elseif soundMode == "AdLib" then SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 4) SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 5) SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 6) end
-- Digitized Sound toggles (items 3-4, picture indices 7-8) if digiMode == "Off" then SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 7) SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 8) elseif digiMode == "SoundBlaster" then SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 7) SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 8) end
-- Music toggles (items 5-6, picture indices 9-10) if not musicEnabled then SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 9) SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 10) else SetPicture('C_NOTSELECTEDPIC', 9) SetPicture('C_SELECTEDPIC', 10) end

Menu.Name: LoadGame
Menu.OnShow: for i = 0, 9 do local name = GetSaveSlotName(i) if name == "" then SetItemText(i, "- empty -") else SetItemText(i, name) end end

Menu.Name: SaveGame
Menu.OnShow: for i = 0, 9 do local name = GetSaveSlotName(i) if name == "" then SetItemText(i, "- empty -") else SetItemText(i, name) end end

Menu.Name: ViewScores
Menu.OnShow: for i = 0, GetHighScoreCount() - 1 do local ep = GetHighScoreEpisode(i) + 1 local lvl = GetHighScoreCompleted(i) SetText("Name" .. i, GetHighScoreName(i)) SetText("Level" .. i, "E" .. ep .. "/L" .. lvl) SetText("Score" .. i, tostring(GetHighScoreScore(i))) end

Menu.Name: LevelComplete
Menu.OnShow:
local floor = GetFloor() SetText("FloorNumber", tostring(floor)) SetText("ParValue", FormatTime(GetParTime())) SetText("TimeValue", FormatTime(GetLevelTime()))
-- Calculate ratios local kr = GetKillTotal() > 0 and math.floor(GetKillCount() * 100 / GetKillTotal()) or 0 local sr = GetSecretTotal() > 0 and math.floor(GetSecretCount() * 100 / GetSecretTotal()) or 0 local tr = GetTreasureTotal() > 0 and math.floor(GetTreasureCount() * 100 / GetTreasureTotal()) or 0
-- Calculate time bonus (500 points per second under par) local parSec = GetParTime() local levelSec = GetLevelTime() local timeBonus = 0 if parSec > 0 and levelSec < parSec then timeBonus = math.floor((parSec - levelSec) * 500) end
-- Calculate total bonus local bonus = timeBonus if kr == 100 then bonus = bonus + 10000 end if sr == 100 then bonus = bonus + 10000 end if tr == 100 then bonus = bonus + 10000 end SetText("BonusValue", tostring(bonus)) GivePoints(bonus)
-- Queue intermission sequence (WL_INTER.C flow) -- Tickers count up one at a time, top to bottom -- Pressing any button during counting skips to final values QueueDelay(2) -- Pause before counting (~2*TickBase) StartTicker("KillRatio", kr) -- Kill ratio counts up StartTicker("SecretRatio", sr) -- Then secret ratio StartTicker("TreasureRatio", tr) -- Then treasure ratio

Menu.Name: HighScores
Menu.OnShow: CheckAndAddHighScore() for i = 0, GetHighScoreCount() - 1 do local ep = GetHighScoreEpisode(i) + 1 local lvl = GetHighScoreCompleted(i) SetText("Name" .. i, GetHighScoreName(i)) SetText("Level" .. i, "E" .. ep .. "/L" .. lvl) SetText("Score" .. i, tostring(GetHighScoreScore(i))) end

StatInfo.BonusScript: SetValue("Yellow Key", 1) PlayDigiSound("D_KEYSND") FlashScreen(0xFFFF00) return true
SetValue("Blue Key", 1) PlayDigiSound("D_KEYSND") FlashScreen(0xFFFF00) return true
if GetValue("Feed") < GetMax("Feed") then AddValue("Feed", 5) FlashScreen(0xFFFF00) return true end return false
if GetValue("Health") < 100 then AddValue("Health", 10) PlayAdLibSound("HEALTH1SND") FlashScreen(0xFFFF00) return true end return false
if GetValue("Health") < 100 then AddValue("Health", 25) PlayAdLibSound("HEALTH1SND") FlashScreen(0xFFFF00) return true end return false
if GetValue("Feed") < GetMax("Feed") then AddValue("Feed", 5) PlayDigiSound("D_BONUSSND") FlashScreen(0xFFFF00) return true end return false
-- N3D: Always navigate to floor 10 for secret level (WL_GAME.C #ifdef GAMEVER_NOAH3D) NavigateToFloor(10) return true
